text.div:
Breast_Radiology_Reporting_1st_STU_ballot

The official URL for this implementation guide is: 

http://hl7.org/fhir/us/breast-radiology/ImplementationGuide/hl7.fhir.us.breast-radiology

Breast Radiology Reporting Implementation Guide

grouping.name: Main Resources
grouping.description: This section contains the main top level resources that are used in a Breast Radiology Report.

grouping.name: Common Resources
grouping.description: This section contains resources that are commonly used throughout a Breast Radiology Report

grouping.name: Common ValueSets
grouping.description: This section contains value sets that are commonly used throughout a Breast Radiology Report

grouping.name: Common CodeSystems
grouping.description: This section contains code systems that are commonly used throughout a Breast Radiology Report

resource.name: Breast Location Clock CodeSystem
resource.description: Codes defining breast body location angles expressed in clock-face units.

resource.name: Mammo Breast Density CodeSystem
resource.description: Codes for mammography breast density values.

resource.name: Mammo Asymmetries CodeSystem
resource.description: Codes defining types of mammography asymmetries.

resource.name: US Posterior Acoustic Features CodeSystem
resource.description: Ultra-sound mass Posterior acoustic features codes.

resource.name: Foreign Object CodeSystem
resource.description: Foreign object codes defining types of foreign objects observed during a Breast Radiology exam

resource.name: Observed Changes CodeSystem
resource.description: Codes defining types of observed changes in an abnormality over time.

resource.name: Observed State CodeSystem
resource.description: Codes for observed state of an abnormality.
